## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                   | Type                                      | Default   |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------- | ----------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `label`    | `label`    |                               | `string`                                  | `''`      |
| `open`     | `open`     | Open the tooltip              | `boolean`                                 | `false`   |
| `position` | `position` | Position of the tooltip arrow | `"above" \| "below" \| "left" \| "right"` | `'below'` |
| `text`     | `text`     |                               | `string`                                  | `''`      |
